task.name: Kafka_Read_From_Topic
task.description: Read messages from a Kafka topic during the specified duration, and from the beginning if this option is set to true.

script.code:
## Initialize variables ZOOKEEPER=zookeeper:2181 KAFKA=localhost:9092 TOPIC=$variables_topic DURATION=$variables_reading_duration ALL=""
if [ "$variables_from_beginning" == "true" ] ; then ALL="--from-beginning" fi
## Check if the topic exists, otherwise create it. exists=$(/opt/kafka/bin/kafka-topics.sh --list --zookeeper $ZOOKEEPER | grep -w "$TOPIC")
if ! [ $exists == $TOPIC ]; then echo "Topic $TOPIC does not exist" exit 1 else timeout $DURATION /opt/kafka/bin/kafka-console-consumer.sh --bootstrap-server $KAFKA --topic $TOPIC $ALL exit 0 fi
